name: uvc
description: Library for USB Video Class (UVC) devices. Used to write software for webcams, camcorders, etcetera.

scripts.lint:fast: npm run --silent prettier && npm run --silent lint:copyright
scripts.lint:copyright: find . -not \( -path './.git/*' -or -path './node_modules/*' \) -type f \( -iname '*.js' -and -not \( -path './.huskyrc.js' -or -path './lib/libuvc.js' -or -path './test/stream-disk/stream-disk.js' \) \) -print0 | xargs -0 grep -L 'This file is part of node-uvc' | sed 's/^/File is missing copyright notice: /'
